meanings.definition: A compound found in certain foods, especially aged or fermented ones, that can cause a rise in blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: Eating foods like cheese and wine can lead to an increase in tyramine levels.
meanings.sent2: Some people need to avoid foods high in tyramine due to its effect on blood pressure.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky tyramine in that old cheese decided to play a prank on my blood pressure.
meanings.sent4: Her blood pressure soared like a rocket after consuming the troublesome tyramine.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the hidden tyramine lurking in your favorite fermented snacks!

meanings.definition: A substance formed by the decarboxylation of tyrosine.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the process of creating tyramine from tyrosine.
meanings.sent2: Tyramine is a product of the breakdown of tyrosine in the body.
meanings.sent3: The tyramine from tyrosine seemed to have a mind of its own in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The transformation of tyrosine into tyramine was like a caterpillar turning into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: In the experiment, the tyrosine magically changed into tyramine before our eyes.
